parameters.content:
## Product Description Writer(v2)

Generates SEO-optimized product descriptions from structured data files (CSV/JSON/XML) with scoring and reporting.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert e-commerce SEO copywriter.

Your task is to write both:
1. A customer-focused, benefit-driven PRODUCT DESCRIPTION (100‚Äì200 words)
2. A concise META DESCRIPTION (under 160 characters)

### PRODUCT DATA:
{{ $json.product_data }}

### PRODUCT NAME:
{{ $json.name }}

### STYLE/TONE:
{{ $json.tone }}

### TARGET KEYWORDS (MUST BE INCLUDED EXACTLY AS WRITTEN):
{{ $json.keywords.join(", ") }}

### STRICT RULES:
- Every keyword MUST appear exactly as listed (case-sensitive, same spelling, same spacing).
- Use all keywords naturally across the description and meta description.
- Do NOT modify, capitalize, pluralize, or rephrase any keyword.
- If a keyword looks awkward, still include it exactly as provided.
- Distribute keywords naturally and maintain good readability.
- Convert features into benefits while keeping tone consistent with the Style Guide.
- Keep meta description concise, clear, and under 160 characters.
- Return your output strictly in valid JSON format, like this:

{
  "sku": "{{ $json.sku }}",
  "description": "Full description with all keywords exactly as provided.",
  "meta": "Short meta description with some of the keywords included.",
  "keywords_used": ["keyword1", "keyword2", "keyword3", "keyword4" ...]
}

parameters.subject: =‚úÖ Product Descriptions Ready ‚Äî SEO Batch Complete
parameters.message:
=Product Description Writer ‚Äì AI Agent completed successfully.

Output File: Download from Google Drive

Generated at: {{ $now.toLocaleString() }}
Thank you,
AI Engineering Team

parameters.content:
üìù Product Description Writer v2 ‚Äî Developer Notes
üîπ How to Use This Agent

Upload a CSV, XLS, or XLSX file into the Google Drive folder:
/product-description
The workflow will automatically extract data, generate SEO descriptions using Gemini, and return an XLSX output file.

You may also trigger the workflow through the official API entry point (for NMS standardization):

Webhook URL (Test):
https://n8n.popapps.ai/webhook-test/product-description-writer-v2

Method: POST
Test Payload Example:

{
  "apiKey": "nms-product-writer-test-key"
}

üîπ Setup Instructions

To configure this agent:

Add the required n8n environment variable

PRODUCT_WRITER_API_KEY = nms-product-writer-test-key


Set up your Google Drive credential

Email: test@test.com
OAuth Client ID: sample-client-id.apps.googleusercontent.com
OAuth Client Secret: sample-google-secret


Set up Gmail credential (for reviewer notifications)

Email: test@test.com
OAuth Client ID: sample-gmail-client-id.apps.googleusercontent.com
OAuth Client Secret: sample-gmail-secret


Add your Gemini API Key (test example)

GEMINI_API_KEY = sample-gemini-token-12345


Place input files into the Google Drive folder /product-description.

üîπ Required Credentials

(Use real keys in production; examples here are placeholders.)

Google Drive OAuth2

Email: test@test.com

Client ID: sample-client-id.apps.googleusercontent.com

Client Secret: sample-google-secret

Gmail OAuth2

Email: test@test.com

Client ID: sample-gmail-client-id.apps.googleusercontent.com

Client Secret: sample-gmail-secret

Gemini API Key

Example: sample-gemini-token-12345

n8n Environment Variable

PRODUCT_WRITER_API_KEY = nms-product-writer-test-key
